verses.roman:
yādavācārya gosāñi śrī-rūpera saṅgī
caitanya-carite teṅho ati baḍa raṅgī

synonyms: yādavācārya—of the name Yādavācārya; gosāñi—spiritual master; śrī-rūpera—of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; saṅgī—associate; caitanya-carite—in the pastimes of Lord Caitanya; teṅho—he; ati—very much; baḍa—great; raṅgī—enthusiastic.
translation: Śrī Yādavācārya Gosāñi, a constant associate of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī, was also very enthusiastic in hearing and chanting about Lord Caitanya's pastimes.
